description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hop til you drop in this new multiplayer adventure.  Collect the coins and avoid the dangerous obstacles.  Challenge up to three of your friends!  The more you play the more Hoppers you unlock!
